title: Batman.Arkham.Origins.Plus.DLCs.Repack-Z10yded
description:
Batman.Arkham.Origins.Plus.DLCs.Repack-Z10yded

Year: 2013 
Genre: Action / 3D / 3rd Person / Stealth 
Publication Type: Singleplayer Rip 
Language: Russian, English 
Sound language: English 
Crack: enclosing 

Author: z10yded
System requirements:
Operating System: - Windows Vista / Windows 7/8 
Processor: - Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2, 2.8 GHz 
Memory: - 2 GB RAM 
Video: - NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS / AMD Radeon HD 3850 or better with 512 MB ??of VRAM 
Sound system: - compatible with DirectX 
Hard disk space: - 12 GB available space


Batman: Arkham Chronicles" - the third edition of the famous series 
Batman: Arkham. You again have to go to a gloomy Gotham. But this time, 
you can take part in the events anticipated the Batman: Arkham Asylum and 
Batman: Arkham City.The game takes place several years before the infamous mutiny. 
Batman is just starting his career a secret crime-fighter, he is young and inexperienced, 
and it will only become the Dark Knight, we know ...

Extras. Information:

Subject campaign Ã‚Â«Batman: Arkham Chronicle" tells an entirely new story authored by 
writers Michael "Dooma" Vendshu and Corey May, behind which the joint work on games 
such as Prince Persia: Warrior Within, Assassin's Creed, Army of Two. Consultant is 
creative director of DC Comics Geoff Johns. You are going to witness the early years 
of Batman as a fighter against crime and first encounter with those who in the future 
will be the sworn enemies of the Dark Knight. 

New Crime Scene facilitates the process of gathering information. With the help of 
cutting-edge gadgets Batman can re-create the virtual version of what happened at 
the crime scene and discover clues, invisible to the naked eye. 

You will Gotham. In the new and familiar places await a variety of opponents, 
which will have to overcome, crimes that require investigation and puzzles that 
need to be unraveled. 

Hunt the criminals that are relevant to the main plot, but not integral to it. 
Contact with them or not - depends on you. On the streets of Gotham's new enemies 
await you - thugs in armor, possessing incredible strength and extremely agile 
opponents keep track of which is not so easy. To come out the winner of each bout 
will have to master the combat system FreeFlow. 

Arsenal Batman will join the new gadgets - such as remote-controlled Bet-claw. 
Save and familiar from past games series devices. In the dark streets of Gotham 
Batman will encounter a number of well-known characters, including Black Mask, 
Deftrouk, Bane, Joker, Anarchy, Captain Gordon and others.


Repack Features 

Removed the multiplayer and localization except Russian and English / no recoded 
Game Version 1.0.0.0 (Update 3) 
Installation time ~ 10 minutes

Additional content: 

Deathstroke Challenge Pack 
Black Mask Challenge Pack 
Gaslight and Brightest Day Skin Pack 
New Millennium Skin Pack 
Infinite Earths Skin Pack 
Batman Legends Skin Pack


Integrated Update 3

List of fixes Update 2 (on fixes Update 3 is not yet known)

Fixed an issue that prevented points, subjects, progress is saved in a network game. 
Fixed a ventilation shaft in the tower Burnley, which did not allow Batman to climb into it. 
Fixed a problem with the focus of continuous combat, this improvement did not open when you 
unlock the third rank Invisible Avenger. 
Fixed problem with provalivaniem through elevators and other places in the game in most cases. 
For players who are stuck in a looped the fall, if you can not return to the game, or if 
everything around looks weird - use this statement: 
1. In the pause menu select "Restart." 
2. If restarting does not work, try to beat all the enemies around you. 
3. If there are no enemies, try to find the door and enter it. 
4. These steps should help you get back in the game.
